message: BLOCKED: Only 3/17 agents reported status files. However, backend work IS substantially complete (7/8 routers exist). Agent coordination appears to have failed - work exists but status tracking doesn't. Awaiting decision: proceed with manual integration or debug agent coordination system.
blocking_issues: Only 3/17 agents have created status files
CRITICAL: 4 routers missing clerkAuth middleware (qos, ddns, reports, logs)
9 existing routers not registered in schema index.ts
security_issues: qos/router.ts missing clerkAuth - endpoints would be publicly accessible
ddns/router.ts missing clerkAuth - endpoints would be publicly accessible
reports/router.ts missing clerkAuth - endpoints would be publicly accessible
logs/router.ts missing clerkAuth - endpoints would be publicly accessible

recommendations.option_a: Proceed with manual integration - abandon agent coordination and complete work directly
recommendations.option_b: Debug agent coordination - investigate why 14 agents didn't report status
